questions.question: A light year is defined as the distance light travels in 1 year. The speed of light ix 3x10 m/s. Which of the following is the nearest estimate of 1 light year?
The velocity of a moving object  is given by

guesses.guess: the area below a displacement-time graph.
the area below a velocity-time graph.
the gradient of a displacement-time graph.
the gradient below a velocity-time graph.

questions.question: A 40kg mass is moving across a horizontal surface at  5 m/s. What is the magnitude of the uniform net force required to bring the mass to a stopin 8.0s?
Two objects, A (mass 6kg) and B (mass 4kg), are stacked one on top of the other as shown.--B is pulled by a force of 20N and all surface are frictionless. What is the acceleration of A?

math-1.title: Supplementary Class 1
math-1.description:
This supplementary Class will focus 
purely on Fractions. Doing 8 questions in 10 mins will
allow you to familiarise yourself with fractions.

reward.message: Plus 2 marks for the next assessment

math-1.title: Supplementary Class 2
math-1.description:
This supplementary class will allow you to
have a deeper understanding of
simultaneous equation.

math-1.title: Supplementary Class 3
math-1.description:
This supplementary class will help you practice
your graph drawing.
